# Underground Adventure - Level 1 Map
# Format: 0=clear, 1=earth, P=player_spawn, E=enemy_spawn, R=rock_spawn
# Grid: 20 rows x 30 columns (matches Coordinate system)

# HUD area (rows 0-2) - always clear
000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000

# Playable area starts here (row 3)
P0000111111111111111111111111111
000001111111111111111111111111111
000011111111111111111111111111111
111111111111111111111111111111111

111111111111111111111111111111111

111111111111111111111111111111111

111111111111111111111111111111111
